kv21.8:5.14: Hañci atthi aniyato rāsi, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv21.8:6.7: “micchattaniyato rāsi, sammattaniyato rāsi, aniyato rāsi”, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv21.8:8.2: diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṃ kammaṃ diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṭṭhena niyataṃ, upapajjavedanīyaṃ kammaṃ … pe …
kv21.8:8.6: Diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṃ kammaṃ upapajjavedanīyaṃ hoti, aparāpariyavedanīyaṃ hoti … pe …
kv21.8:8.8: upapajjavedanīyaṃ kammaṃ diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṃ hoti, aparāpariyavedanīyaṃ hoti … pe …
kv21.8:8.10: aparāpariyavedanīyaṃ kammaṃ diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṃ hoti, upapajjavedanīyaṃ hotīti?
kv21.8:8.12: Tena hi diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṃ kammaṃ diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṭṭhena niyataṃ, upapajjavedanīyaṃ kammaṃ … pe …
kv21.8:11.1: Sāsanaṃ navaṃ kataṃ atthi koci tathāgatassa sāsanaṃ navaṃ karoti labbhā tathāgatassa sāsanaṃ puna navaṃ kātuṃ, puthujjano tedhātukehi kammehi avivitto, atthi kiñci saṃyojanaṃ appahāya arahattappatti, atthi adhippāyiddhi buddhānaṃ vā sāvakānaṃ vā, atthi buddhānaṃ buddhehi hīnātirekatā, sabbā disā buddhā tiṭṭhanti, sabbe dhammā niyatā, sabbe kammā niyatāti.
